comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: daveg4otu.tripod.com/airfields/far2.html has pictures by the same photographer (Mays of Aldershot) of airships at Aldershot and Farnborough. Aldershot [en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aldershot] and Farnborough [en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Farnborough,_Hampshire] are close together in southeastern England, in the northeast of Hampshire, near the border with Surrey (~35 miles southwest of London)

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Just noticed that an enthusiast put the Bain airship photos up on Flickr (in 2005). See, for example, www.flickr.com/photos/39411748@N06/6182473349/.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: And the (UK) Imperial War Museum has many such pictures. See www.iwm.org.uk/collections/item/object/205192495
